com.quantcomponents.core.remote
Interface ITaskMonitorHost

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaskMonitorHost
public interface ITaskMonitorHost

Remote host version of ITaskMonitor. This interface is typically implemented on the client side in a distributed configuration. The server sends progress message, that in turn are passed to an internal ITaskMonitor, visible on the client.
